podcast.name: 60-Second Science
podcast.description: Tune in every weekday for quick reports and commentaries on the world of science—it'll just take a minute

podcast_episode.title: S1 BONUS | A million-dollar reward
podcast_episode.name: S1 BONUS | A million-dollar reward
podcast_episode.description: <p>Victoria Police is set to announce a one million dollar reward for information that finally solves the case of Maria James, who was murdered in the back of her bookshop 44 years ago. And for the first time in seven years of investigating this case, police grant an interview to Rachael Brown.</p>
podcast_episode.filename: Trace - S1 BONUS | A million-dollar reward.

podcast_episode.title: S1 Bonus | Maria James inquest finding
podcast_episode.name: S1 Bonus | Maria James inquest finding
podcast_episode.description: <p>A Victorian Coroner has failed to name a killer in the 1980 cold case of Maria James. Her sons are devastated. But there's still hope, in leads yet to be chased by police.</p>
podcast_episode.filename: Trace - S1 Bonus | Maria James inquest finding.

podcast_episode.title: S1 Bonus | Breakthrough in Maria James cold case
podcast_episode.name: S1 Bonus | Breakthrough in Maria James cold case
podcast_episode.description: <p>The discovery of a police exhibit - thought to be missing for around three decades - could finally help unmask the killer in the 1980 cold case of Maria James.</p>
podcast_episode.filename: Trace - S1 Bonus | Breakthrough in Maria James cold case.

podcast_episode.title: COVID, Quickly, Episode 12: Masking Up Again and Why People Refuse Shots
podcast_episode.name: COVID, Quickly, Episode 12: Masking Up Again and Why People Refuse Shots
podcast_episode.filename: 60-Second Science - COVID, Quickly, Episode 12: Masking Up Again and Why People Refuse Shots.mp3
